params.endTime: Timestamp after which the market can be resolved.
params.token: ERC20 used for staking and payouts.

params.yes: True for YES, false for NO.

params.data: Resolver-specific payload (for X402Resolver this is encoded (uint64 resolvedAt, bytes signature)).

claim(uint256).notice: Claim winnings after a market is resolved.

placeWager(uint256,bool,uint256).notice: Place a YES or NO wager on a market.

resolveMarket(uint256,uint8,bytes).notice: Resolve a market using the configured resolver.
